mapper.sql: id, name, status, created_time, modified_time, creator, modifier, remark
mapper.insert: insert into blue_role ( name, status, created_time, modified_time, creator, modifier, remark ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from blue_role where name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{opts},'%')
